label: Station ID
description: Sequential number assigned to each record in the EWM_STATION table

label: Site Code
description: Location based 18 character alphanumeric code assigned to each well

label: Water Level Measurement Unique Id
description: Unique database identifier for water level measurement

label: Water Level Measurement Date (PST)
description: Date/Time (in PST) the groundwater level measurement was collected

label: RPE for a specific water level measurement record
description: Reference Point Elevation used to collect the groundwater level measurement in feet referenced to the North American Vertical Datum of 1988 (NAVD88)

label: GSE for a specific water level measurement record
description: Ground Surface Elevation at the well site  in feet referenced to the North American Vertical Datum of 1988 (NAVD88)

label: Reading at WS
description: Reading on the measurement device at water surface.  Typically 0 for electric tape.  Generally used for steel tape measurements, however typically is not 0

label: Reading at RP
description: Reading shown on the measurement device at reference point

label: WS Elevation
description: Water Surface Elevation in feet referenced to the North American Vertical Datum of 1988 (NAVD88)

label: RPE to WSE
description: Depth below reference point or the distance from reference point to water surface in feet

label: GSE to WSE
description: Depth below ground surface or the distance from ground surface to water surface in feet

label: Water Level Measurement Quality Description
description: Quality assurance description for groundwater level measurement (questionable or no measurement code)

label: Water Level Measurement Method Description
description: Description of water level measurement method

label: Water Level Measurement Accuracy Description
description: Description for accuracy of water level (elevation) measurement

label: Water Level Measurement Organization ID
description: The Organization ID of the data collector

label: Water Level Measurement Organization/Agency Name
description: Water level measurement organization/agency full name - Linked to WLM_ORG_ID

label: Cooperating Organization Identifier
description: Unique database identifier for organization providing water level measurement

label: Cooperating Organization Name
description: Name of organization providing water level measurement
